name: Twitter - Choose to hide Follow/Trends
description: Able to choose if you want to show either Trends or Follow but not both, hide both or show both.
additional_info:
9 July 2020 - That container that wouldnt go away... (Yeah it came back I had update to get rid of it again)

9 Jan 2020 - Update and some fixes
Update and some minor fixes for that container not hiding again. Works with all schemes.

9 Oct 2019 - Update
The container of the hidden section occasionally appears for some reason... should be fixed now I hope.

1 Sep 2019 - Initial Release
Works with default (white) scheme. Not sure why it doesn't hide the container properly on dim and dark mode.
